DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate effect soy/dairy protein blend muscle growth strength . In sport nutrition age important healthy muscle . This achieve exercise nutrition . Consumption protein follow resistance exercise promote healthy muscle growth help improve strength . Young healthy men study 12 week resistance exercise training program give protein supplement every day study . The hypothesis blend soy , whey casein induce great muscle gain strength increase control .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Protein Blend Supplementation During Exercise Training Muscle Growth Strength
DOC.criteria: Stable body weight , healthy , male age 1835 1 . Exercise training ( > 2 weekly session moderate high intensity aerobic resistance exercise ) 2 . Resistance Training ( > 2 weekly session moderate high intensity ) within past six month 3 . Any orthopedic injury prohibits participation exercise training 4 . Significant heart , liver , kidney , blood , respiratory disease 5 . Peripheral vascular disease 6 . Diabetes mellitus untreated endocrine disease 7 . Active cancer ( group ) history cancer 8 . Acute infectious disease history chronic infection ( e.g . TB , hepatitis , HIV , herpes ) 9 . Recent ( within 6 month ) treatment anabolic steroid , corticosteroid . 10 . Alcohol drug abuse 11 . Tobacco use ( smoke chew ) 12 . BMI range ( 2029.9 kg/m2 ) exclude Malnutrition ( hypoalbuminemia , and/or hypotransferrinemia ) Obesity 13 . Low hemoglobin level ( normal value ) 14 . Food allergy ( include milk soy ) 15 . Individuals Vegetarian Diet 16 . Females 17 . Average protein intake < 0.6 > 1.8 g/kg per day 18 . Taking dietary supplement green tea , creatine , ribose , whey soy protein , etc . within past 6 month 19 . Currently highsoy diet high dairy diet ( consume > 2 serving soy per day > 6 serving dairy )
